More like
{{champion:29}}

I'm honestly thorn. The old hyena skin is goddamn awesome. While this new one has it's cools aspects, I found the head a bit too lame. Specially with the goggles. On the bright side Warwick HAS A FUCKING V8 ENGINE ON HIS BACK!

But yeah, it's very likely that I won't be buying this skin for him (which was my go to option when I heard about his rework).
The engine is why I want it. It revs.

am I the only one who gets a Crash Bandicoot vibe from it?

looks like crash racing to me
the post right above you mentions crash bandicoot so guess not lol
I miss the old "World of Warcraft" Hogger reference....{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

OMG YES! Thank you! It was bothering me what this looked like and his explains it!
And Crash is getting VGU soon, too. Coincidence? I think not.
The most Twitch-like of the Warwick skins {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}}
The most, but not the only.

Riot have forgotten to add the special laugh to his Q animation and give him the unique run animation. That was the main reason alot of people bought this skin and made it so much different and fun to play him.

It's possible If people will make posts about this they'll change it. Katarina update (true, it was update part of larger work) also missed some particles uniquefying her other skins and when people ranted about it, they eventually updated some of the skins post-announcement.

What a day!

What a lovely day!
https://media.giphy.com/media/32SkQF4253HAA/giphy.gif
Get the Special Laugh and the Q laugh back and Hyena might overtake Marauder IMO
I feel like you looked at the Vandal line for some inspiration

get rid of the goggles and this skin be perfect.
He just looks like a goof with them
Thats the point

I guess. 
Just prefer hyena warwicks almost joker like stance
Skin looks like garbo with the goggles;;; really hope they take it  off or atleast give an option to remove it like vi

What a wonderful DAY

WITNESS MEEEE

Mediocre...
I want.
Im super disappointed. current hyena skin is so good. new one is garbo
All skins except grey, tundra, and firefang were duds.
Reminds me of a Crash Bandicoot character.
This is my favorite of all Warwick's updated skins!!! :D
They have to change the figure of the head. It's not Warwick-like. It's more like Twitch.

Looks like fucking Twitch. This is my favorite skin on current Warwick. This new one is just UGHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!! I suppose it is a nice ploy to get everyone to spend money on Tundra Warwick since it is now the clear best >(
Can we at least keep some of his old laughing sound effects?
Looks awful lot like Twitch to be honest if not for the teeth.

WE LIVE

WE DIE

WE LIVE AGAIN



Kinda describes Warwick's life cycle in game...
Looks like a dude from Mad Max

Yea I liked the old hyena skin where he, ya know looks like a hyena and not some weird steam punk movie inspired goggles wearing warwick. If they wanted him to give him a skin inspired by some movie ATLEAST make an entirely different skin so you don't screw over the people who like what it already is.
"OoOoo it's a killing machine, its got everything"

this is sooooooooo bad lol
i was really excited about hyena warwick since i own it and like it in its current form
but the model and splash from the new one look SO GARBAGE 
wtf why does he even have goggles? why no red eyes ? would look so much better man

I honestly can't help but agree... Hyena warwick used to be the BEST skin for warwick. It just made him look 100x better and also it gave him a special chase thing. It just looks like a normal skin now, and I'd much rather use the grandma one. I hope that they improve on that skin a bunch, because I know that it's not final yet. Steam doesn't even come out of his engine when he sees a blood trail, like c'mon.

i really dont like this skin now
it used to be one of my favorites, but now the model and splash seen kinda lame
I like the new hyenna skin, but I'm really disappointed it isn't closer to the original Hyenna skin.

This skin looks terrible. Goggles on a hyena just makes him look dumb. I felt the same way with rek'sai when they gave her swim gear and had Draven riding her like a horse. Just embarassing. This used to be one of my favorite skins and now I wish I could trade it in.
